comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Haha... our very particular use of Travis is currently affected by a [service degradation](https://www.traviscistatus.com/incidents/wmjj5hwvytzc). This looks good to me. I'll merge in the morning after the Linux builds pass. Thanks!

comments.author: JumpingYang001
comments.body: Got it, thanks. I have seen it is upgrading some software.
